part_description: Contains two buttons on top, a scroll wheel between, with a smooth, curved surface. Compact size fits comfortably in hand.
internal_interaction_description: The buttons and scroll wheel are mechanically connected to internal switches. Pressing a button activates a switch, sending a signal to the computer. The scroll wheel rotates, engaging a sensor to scroll on the screen.
external_interaction_description: Interacts wirelessly with a computer via a USB receiver or Bluetooth. Users move the mouse to control cursor position on the screen, clicking buttons to select or execute commands, and scrolling for navigation.
